type.name: product_group_classification_item
type.description: specifies the classification of the relationship between a group and its subgroup

type.name: product_group_type
type.description: type of group, which characterizes the common property of all members, for instance scheduled for maintenance

entity.name: Product_group
entity.description: means to group products and types in order to set boundaries of PIF.

explicit.name: characteristics
explicit.description: specifies the type of this group, also understood as the characteristics which is common to all members

explicit.name: description
explicit.description: Captures description of characteristics which defines this group

explicit.name: top_item
explicit.description: individual product which represents the logical or physical unit where the product in focus belongs to. This is for instance the complete vehicle

entity.name: Product_group_membership
entity.description: captures the product as member of the group with reference to the product as individual and its top item within the physically assembled complete product

explicit.name: member
explicit.description: product, which is the subject of this produc group

explicit.name: of_group
explicit.description: specifies the member os a group throuh the Product_group_membership

entity.name: Product_group_relationship
entity.description: Relates a product_group as a subset of another group, the identification of the relationsship as a subgroup relationship is specified through the product_group_classification_item
